x_symbol.description: Determine how far the window (or an element) has scrolled vertically.

par.name: ele
par.note: id string or object reference. If undefined return document scrollTop

par.name: bWin
par.note: if true, ele is assumed to be a reference to a window object

x_symbol.return: the number of pixels the element (or window) has scrolled vertically

rev.author: mf
rev.note: Combined multiple var statements into one.

rev.author: mf
rev.note: If ele is document or html or body then return document.scrollTop, not ele.scrollTop
